pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video captures a scenic view of a pathway in a zoo or park. The scene is filled with lush green trees, rock formations, and animal enclosures in the background. The camera pans to the right, following the path and revealing more of the park's pleasant, naturalistic environment.
